Table (ngTasty.table)

A lightweight table directive with sorting, pagination and filtering support.

Can use as client or server-side sorting and pagination. To activate the client-side, you need passing a javascript object by the resource attribute, instead for the server-side you need passing a callback function by the resource callback

Settings can be provided as attributes in the <tasty-table>.

  • resource-callback : The function callback.

  • filters (Defaults: {}) : The filters object.

Settings can be provided as attributes in the <tasty-thead>.

  • not-sort-by (Defaults: []) : list key columns not want sort
